item.title: scrot
item.description: scrot is a program used for taking screenshots. scrot supports a wide many image formats as well as options for interactive screen selection. Usage Examples … Take a screenshot and save it to the current working directory. The filename will be the current date. $ scrot Take a screenshot and save it as “capture.png”. $ scrot capture.png Take a screenshot interactively. $ scrot --select capture.png Take a screenshot of the current window.
